description: Forlinx Embedded recently introduced the FETMX8MPL-C SoM, a cost-effective solution for industrial and IoT applications that balances performance and functionality without incorporating advanced multimedia or machine learning features. The FETMX8MPL-C SoM is powered by the NXP i.MX 8M Plus Quad Lite processor, featuring a quad-core Cortex-A53 CPU running at 1.6GHz and a Cortex-M7 for real-time […]
title: Forlinx Unveils Cost-Effective i.MX8MPL-C SoM for Industrial Applications

description: The Atomic Echo Base is a voice recognition module designed for compatibility with the M5 Atom series. It combines the ES8311 audio decoder, a MEMS microphone, and a NS4150B power amplifier to support audio processing in interactive applications. The ES8311 audio codec, which supports 24-bit resolution and sample rates from 16KHz to 64KHz via I2S […]
title: Atomic Echo Base Enables Voice Recognition for M5 Atom Series
